body:
Hey, I recently released my texture pack, Faithful 32x with lots of small added features.
The download link can be found here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=31xw3cVTfDM

Thanks :)

title: My Texture Pack Has Been Released!

replies.body:
Wow, this is really good!
I love the simplicity of it.
Well Done!
replies.body_tagged:
Wow, this is really good!
I love the simplicity of it.
Well Done!

replies.body: Thanks, I dislike texture packs that change the vanilla textures drasticly so I decided to use this one. I can't go back to vanilla now -_-

replies.body: Please don't take credit for other peoples work. This looks like Faithful Resources.
replies.body_tagged: Please don't take credit for other peoples work. This looks like Faithful Resources.

replies.body: It is lots of textures from different packs put into one pack
replies.body_tagged: It is lots of textures from different packs put into one pack

reply_to.body: Please don't take credit for other peoples work. This looks like Faithful Resources.
reply_to.body_tagged: Please don't take credit for other peoples work. This looks like Faithful Resources.

replies.body:
I have to admit, it looks extremely similar to Faithful 32x. Could you create a list of all the added features that you put into the texture pack?

I noticed:
  • Bow Charge Meter
  • Changed HD Critical Particles
  • Awesome Pumpkin Texture :3
I would rate this pack, but so far I only notice minute changes.

replies.body: Looks great, its probably going to be my first, and last pack!
replies.body_tagged: Looks great, its probably going to be my first, and last pack!

replies.body: Custom sky, and lots of minor tweaks that I can't even remember doing, including added splashes and a few more :)
